cnd19:6.7: cūḷanikaṁ → culanikaṁ (bj) | lokadhātuṁ passeyya, mahāsahassimpi → tisahassampi mahāsahassiṁ (bj); tisahassiṁ mahāsahassampi (mr) | yāvatakaṁ vā → yāvatā (bj, mr)
cnd19:7.2: hāsapañño → idaṁ padaṁ bj potthake | adhigatapaṭisambhido → adhigatapaṭisambhidappatto (csp1ed)
cnd19:8.4: atthi jānitabbaṁ → atthi dhammaṁ jānitabbaṁ (bj, mr) | paramattho vā attho → paramattho vā (sya-all, csp1ed)
cnd19:9.5: sammāphusitānaṁ → sammā phassitānaṁ (bj); phusitānaṁ (sya-all) | aññamaññapariyantaṭṭhāyino → … pariyantaṭṭhāniyo te (bj); aññamaññaṁ pariyantaṭṭhāyino (sya-all) | Yathā → yathā pana (bj)
cnd19:11.1: timitimiṅgalaṁ → timitipiṅgalaṁ (mr) | sabrahmako loko → sabrahmako (bj, sya-all) | sadevako → sadevako loko (mr)
cnd19:14.3: antonimuggaposīni → antonimuggapositāni (sya-all); antonimmuggaposīni (mr) | Seyyathāpi → taṁ kiṁ maññatha (bj, sya-all, mr)
cnd19:31.1: pañhena atthiko āgatomhi → pañhatthikamhā āgatā (bj, sya-all)
cnd19:42.2: nāyaṁ, bhikkhave, kāyo tumhākaṁ … → ayaṁ pāṭho si potthake natthi | aññesaṁ → paresaṁ (sya-all)
cnd19:43.1: Avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā … → ayaṁ pāṭho si potthake natthi
cnd19:44.3: rūpaṁ assāraṁ … → ayaṁ pāṭho si potthake natthi | assāraṁ → asāraṁ (bj)
cnd19:45.2: setakaccho → setavaccho (bj, cck, mr); setagaccho (sya1ed, sya2ed, csp1ed) | pālibhaddako → pāribhaddako (bj); pāḷibhaddako (mr) | pheṇapiṇḍo → pheṇupiṇḍo (sya-all) | udakapubbuḷaṁ → udakabububuḷakaṁ (bj); pubbulakaṁ (sya-all)
